page.title: 05Lyminge shops (cont)
page.content: The VG shop is owned by the Ware-Lanes. The chemist belongs to the Moores, the Post Office is owned by Mr & Mrs Blanche. Mace belongs to the Roberts and Lyminge Stationers is owned by Mrs Sturman. The newsagents belongs to the Wrensand Haywards own the bakery. Gills own the hardware shop. The off-licence is owned by Mr & Mrs Baker, the fish and chip shop belongs to the Hinkleys. The Mace store is the biggst and more like a supermarket. The VG is the smallest. The cafe is the oldest and Lyminge Fashions is the newest, opened this year. "The VG is homely" said one person. In the stationers you could spend an hour or more looking round. The bakery has a lovely smell.
